title: scanoma mole check
description:
Worried about a mole or skin blemish? Scanoma helps you monitor your moles by providing similarity insights to concerning skin images and connects you with licensed dermatologists for professional feedback.

Using computer vision, Scanoma provides:
- AI-powered insights about your skin images
- Informational similarity indicators 
- Connection to dermatologists for expert review

Additional Features:
- Educational articles about skin health awareness
- Access to skin health information

Technical Requirements:
- Requires clear, unobstructed skin images
- May not work with tattooed areas
- Push notifications for optimal performance

Privacy & Support:
- Your images stay on your phone unless you choose to submit them to a doctor
- Support available at: support@scanoma.com

Disclaimers:
- AI-powered insights provide informational guidance only
- Our AI similarity indicators are not a replacement for a medical evaluation
- Educational content and articles are for informational purposes only
- For any medical assessment, consult with a dermatologist
- Not suitable for children under 13

summary: Snap & Save the Skin You're In. Fast Mole Monitoring & Expert Skin Insights
